meanings.sent1: Televiewing is my favorite way to relax after a long day.
meanings.sent2: Many people enjoy televiewing in the evenings.
meanings.sent3: During the power outage, we had to resort to televiewing by candlelight.
meanings.sent4: Her televiewing habits were like a window into her daily routine.
meanings.sent5: The family room was filled with the sound of televiewing every night.

meanings.definition: The practice of viewing television programs.
meanings.sent1: Televiewing of sports events brings the family together.
meanings.sent2: Some televiewing services offer a wide range of programs.
meanings.sent3: His dedication to televiewing every new series was unmatched.
meanings.sent4: Televiewing can open up new worlds and perspectives.
meanings.sent5: The quality of televiewing has improved with advancements in technology.
